J.R. Rouse of Sotheby's International Realty Intention / Goal is to be your best resource for real estate advice. Whether you are a buyer, seller, or investor, I provide you the answer to any questions you might have about real estate. Subscribe to this blog to get the latest news on local market trends and receive expert tips for buying or selling a home. - With Appreciation J.R. Rouse, Broker Associate
